channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
i need help coding, i need to know how to rotate global objects, i thought i could rotate by changing the 10 in this code; addobject 2131, 1231, 2213, 0, 10 right here ^ i tryed various numbers, if i am wrong can some one post the correct way to rotate an object. if i am right, what numbers are degrees or whatever.
if im posting in wrong section sorry.
if its easier add my msn nate-420@live.com thanks :D
